entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
